author: Ronn Blitzer
title: Sen. Cotton: Chinese government 'still lying' about coronavirus as evidence indicates rising death tolls
description: Sen. Tom Cotton, R-Ark., is calling out the Chinese government for continuing to lie about coronavirus, after their initial response to it – according to him – caused it to become the global problem that it is.
content:
Sen. Tom Cotton, R-Ark., is calling out the Chinese government for continuing to lie about coronavirus, after their initial response to it – according to him – caused it to become the global problem that it is.
Cotton pointed to facts on the ground in China … [+2980 chars]
